attributes.action: make this change to the economy:
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: As the general public may know, the chocolates known as Ferrero Rocher are delectable, delicious, and more-ish. This house therefore believes that employers should have the right to pay employees either in currency or in Ferrero Rochers. The ideal exchange rate would be five Fererro Rochers to one pound.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
